ygData.subject: Re: All i know bout Najena Dungeon...
ygData.msgSnippet: well.. as a dark elf im prepared to screw up any faction except for the evil races... i will be killing the barbarian for the fish bone ear ring and thast
ygData.messageBody:
well.. as a dark elf im prepared to screw up any faction except for the evil
races... i will be killing the barbarian for the fish bone ear ring and
thast something im gonna carry for good... unless a better item comes
along...

as for killing treat... i believe it only affects the faction with unkempt
druids... n the druids never like me in the first place... n i havent found
a way to improve it...

qeynos is believe just by killing hundreds n hundreds of gnolls will do the
job.... when i get the level... camping there for one weekend will do the
trick... i believe... hehe...

another ear ring slot is reserved for the ivandyr's hoop from swamp... but
dont have the money to buy rubies yet... so until i get extra cash i will
try the quest... hehe this one for evil races only... +6 INT +6 WIS....
although not eveyrtime she gives the hoop... so i need quite alot of money
to buy rubiessssss.....

Nicademous
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 5:14 PM
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] All i know bout Najena Dungeon...


> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Kenven managed to get his DE faction till the extend tat he dun kena KOS
in
> FP at just lvl 12 or so, u better dun do something that affect ya faction
> with Qeynos and the druids. Who know later got those Jboot kinda non-drop
> lore item quest there u lan lan die cock stand, hehe.
>
> p/s: Right now Qeynos got some plus 3 INT earring quest, quite good for
lvl
> 20s.
>
>
> On Thursday, 19 August, 1999 11:36 AM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
> [SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> > From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> >
> > ok... drez spwawn every 20 mins... if she doesnt spawn... a necro will
be
> in
> > her place... so no gurantee that she will spawn... also jboots is no
> > gurantee... rumors that said that she give jboots every 8 hours... and
> each
> > time 3 in a row... but so far i have no seen it to be any true... so its
> a
> > bloody long wait... the worst camping session that u ever had... worse
> than
> > fbr... since someone can gather like 10fbr.. and we still havent get 1
> > boots... its that bad...
> >
> > usually folks queue up for the boots... so when i got there... say
theres
> 3
> > person... then they will auto invite me into the group... whenever we
> kill
> > drez... the 1st person in line will always loot her... until he/she get
> the
> > boots.. then the next person in line comes up... (bcos its LORE AND NO
> > DROP)... this goes on n on... ocasionally u get bastards that come n try
> to
> > loot... usually they are kicked out of the group immediately... off
> course u
> > can steal the kill if u want... but usually everyone follow this... so
> dont
> > be surprised that u go there and theres like 3-4 person in najena
> dungeon...
> > BUT all 3-4 in that bloody room waiting for her to spwan the boots... so
> > thast y i said its a long wait... u just have to get in line somewhere
> > sometime... dont expect that place to be empty... most unlikely...
unless
> u
> > lucky...
> >
> > as fer najena room... can be empty for a long time... not everyone camp
> > her... but sometimes there are.... as for fbr... its not really a great
> robe
> > to wear... when u reach level 34-35... u might wanna get the oracle robe
> > instead... with a team of level 30+... shoud have no prob killing the
> > oracle.. its just getting the faction hit... hehe... so oracle robe
> usually
> > sells for 1k pp... and not many sell em...
> >
> > its a good idea to camp both sites... esp when one side need help the
> other
> > team is just round the corner... but i wouldnt do it this weekend...
have
> > enough of najena dungeon.... i wanna be damn level 30.... so perhaps
next
> > weekend... if possible.. im sure to hit level 25 this weekend... more i
> > dunno... but i hope 27... hehe... since im close to 24 now... then i
will
> be
> > hunting treants....
> >
> > as for the bloodclaw... its only necro, shadow knight n rogue weapon
> only...
> > so we can camp and sell it... usually it goes for 200-250pp.... also...
> the
> > loot there is pretty good... theres quite alot of fine steel weapon loot
> > from necromancers... sometimes stones... n coins...
> >
> > Nicademous
> > p/s : if everyone is above level 25 and is commited to stay for a long
> > time... i dont mind going there again... dont wanna go there... camp for
> 5-6
> > hours then everyone starts leaving... then i dont see the point...
> everyone
> > must at least commit like 10-12 hours to be safe to get something for
> > everyone... n bloody want the jboots!!!!
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 12:03 PM
> > Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] All i know bout Najena Dungeon...
> >
> >
> > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > >
> > > WAH this dungeon got so many goodies! OK OK, I will organise a lvl
> 25-35
> > > hunting trip to Najena next weekend. Those 20-25 still got more than
a
> > > week to buck up. Since this place got so many stuffs our kakis
> community
> > > can use, I strongly encourage those who can make it join the event.
We
> > may
> > > be more than 1 grp but it's ok as long as we have the lvl to do thing
> > > smoothly. And for that hunt, we may need to use guidesay. So those
> below
> > > lvl 25, dun just drop ya saliver, start ya god damn training NOW!!! ;)
> > >
> > > p/s: Since Drezlna spawn every 20 min, does that mean Jboot also spawn
> > > quite fast? Or it's like 10 Drezlna only spawn 1 Jboot kinda thing?
I
> > > heard abt queueing for Najena, how does tat works? Better explain
> > > everything to all kakis b4 we act foolishly and offended other grps,
> hehe.
> > >
> > > On Thursday, 19 August, 1999 10:48 AM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
> > > [SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> > > > From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> > > >
> > > > ok... as far as i know... najena herself (where u get tome or fbr)
is
> > > level
> > > > 28 mage.. she will havea elemental pet... sometimes when she doesnt
> > > spawn..
> > > > a elemental will spawn on her spot instead... her 2 guardians are 2
> > > > magicians bout level 20+ but i believe not more than level 25...
they
> > too
> > > > will have elemental pets...
> > > >
> > > > as for drezlna (where u get bloodclaw or jboots) is level 25
> > > necromancer...
> > > > she will have a pet skele... sometimes when she doesnt spawn... a
> > > > necromancer will spawn on her spot instead ... she spawns every 20
> > > mins....
> > > > either her or one necro...
> > > > her 2 guardians are 2 necromancers bout level 20+ but i believe
> should
> > > not
> > > > be more than 22 since they all con blue to me when i was level 22
> > > there...
> > > > they too will have pet skeletons...
> > > >
> > > > if u managed to break the spawn at the beginning... then will be
> easy...
> > > > the last time...my group consist of 2 shadow knight level 20-25,
plus
> me
> > > and
> > > > one magician level 25... we managed to hold that place for drezlna
> ...
> > > not
> > > > problem.... occasionally... there will be ogre guards, tentacles and
> > > moosh
> > > > that comes into the room and create trouble... they always choose to
> > come
> > > at
> > > > the 'right' time... also.. somehow theres a bug in that room that
> > > sometimes
> > > > moosh can punch thru the wall... so be careful.... as for najena
> room...
> > > > there are ocasionally froglock ghouls that interrupts the room...
> others
> > > im
> > > > not sure... perhaps elementals... tanks are certainly good help...
> but 2
> > > -3
> > > > high level spell casters can do the job liaoz... as fer monks... i
> think
> > > if
> > > > u camp Rathyl (or something like that)... theres a jewel piece YY
> might
> > > be
> > > > interested... hehe.. not sure if hes still interested... but i heard
> > > monks
> > > > needs em...Black Sapphire or something like that...
> > > >
> > > > u need a golden key to get into najena's room and a purple one into
> > > drez's
> > > > room.... we can also camp the bone cracker for dark circlet... but
> thats
> > > > necro only item... hehe... or the ogre captian for some weapon...
> that
> > > tanks
> > > > might be interested.... thats all i know bout that stupid dungeon...
> > > >
> > > > Nicademous
> > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > > > Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 11:18 AM

> > > >
> > > >

> > > > > Heheh, then wat say u if we make a trip for FBR coming up?

> > > > > But 1st thing 1st, I still wanna know the normal mob lvl in
Najena.
> > If
> > > > all
> > > > > other mobs are ard lvl 20, it will make a pure casters grp to even

> > > > > the destination coz we will be busy nuking and meding. Once our
> mana
> > > all
> > > > > out, all die cock stand.
> > > > >
> > > > > Thus I would suggest only those high lvl 20s to come along, esp
> when
> > > there
> > > > > is no tank. Nica and Zan better buck up. Kell and Kal too if

> > > ;)

> along

> > > > > may feel boring, hehe. But Jboot definitely need tanks, and "most

> > > > >
> > > > > FF got his FBR at 175pp, let see if we can all get it FOC :) With
> 2
> > > wiz,
> > > > 3
> > > > > magi at least, it shldnt be too problematic to get FBR.
> > > > >
> > > > > OOi, hurry up lvl leh! ;)
> > > > >
> > > > > Ziltus
> > > > >

maybe
> > > even
> > > > > the

> > > > pair

> > > > > fbr
> > > > > > is much easier... but 3 person its impossible to camp for fbr n
> > > boots...
> > > > > > bcos both are at different location... although same dungeon...
> but
> >
> > > need
> > > > > the

> > then
> > > > can

> at
> > > one
> > > > > > place... i think good enough... so if we have like 4 level 20
> and 2
> > > > > level
> > > > > > 30... we can bao the whole dungeon liaoz... but then... theres
> > always
> > > > > > someone there to camp jboots... but fbr not all the time...
> > > > > >
> > > > > > speaking from my 19 hours in dungeon najena...
> > > > > > Nicademous
